scene.name: intro
scene.line: Weird, somehow I thought it was `his` truck, and delivery and all.
It `was`, that's what she's saying. He just left it behind.But he gave it to her, before they took him away.
`(To SHANNON.)` But you're going to deliver it anyway? Why?
scene.option: He's my friend. He needs my help to finish his job.

scene.name: friend
scene.line: That's right. He's our friend too — Johnny and I will help you unload when we get there.

scene.name: on-the-way
scene.line: OK, right, you were saying ... the TV station is up there somewhere.
But it's old furniture or something, right? Can you lift all that by yourself?
Johnny and I will help you unload when we get there. We've got nowhere else to be.

scene.name: recipient
scene.line: Have you got a name, or just an address? Maybe it doesn't matter — even having discharged all that whatever-it-is onto the lawn, I'm sure you'd still have fulfilled your friend's obligation.
Johnny and I will help you unload when we get there.

scene.name: lift-with-your-legs
scene.line: `(To JOHNNY.)` Lift with your legs, cricket.
